eventSummary: C&M Software was involved in a major cyberattack in June 2025, which disrupted Brazil’s financial infrastructure and is considered the largest cybercrime in the country’s history and a significant strike against its national payment system. The DragonForce hacking group claims to have breached C&M Software and exfiltrated 393.9 GB of data, with a ransom deadline of November 29, 2025.Sources:- https://bsky.app/profile/hackmanac.com/post/3m67rnsqou42e- https://bsky.app/profile/hackmanac.com/post/3m67rnr7fn42f
